mapper.select: SELECT job_stt_dtm, job_end_dtm, trigger_group, trigger_name, job_group, job_name, job_exec_sta_cd, exec_prog_name, exec_prog_seq, job_exec_rslt FROM tb_exec_history WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY trigger_group ASC, trigger_name ASC, job_stt_dtm ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_exec_history (trigger_stt_dtm, exec_prog_seq, exec_prog_name, trigger_group, trigger_name, job_group, job_name, job_stt_dtm, job_end_dtm, job_exec_sta_cd, job_exec_rslt) values (#{triggerSttDtm}, #{execProgSeq}, #{execProgName}, #{triggerGroup}, #{triggerName}, #{jobGroup}, #{jobName}, #{jobSttDtm}, #{jobEndDtm}, #{jobExecStaCd}, #{jobExecRslt})
